      • update

        public void update()
        Take a step using the Velocity Verlet (Leapfrog) ODE integration algorithm. Additional Method to Check if particles have left simulation.

      • kepler_omega

      • kepler_shear

        public float kepler_shear​(float r)
        Method to calculate the Keplerian shear. Equal to -(3/2)Omega for a Keplerian orbit or -rdOmega/dr.
        Parameters:
        r - Radial position (semi-major axis) to calculate the period [m].
        Returns:
        Shear [radians/s].
